column2: "Iyi nye nsɛm a EWURADZE yii kyerɛɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi Habakuk."

column4: ana ɔwo etsie me? Musu frɛ wo wɔ enyimpisɛm ntsi

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ema muhu emumuyɛ
column3: na ɔbrakyew rokɔ do pii na ennyɛ ho hwee yi? Ɔsɛɛ na emimdzi wɔ m’enyim: na aperper wɔ hɔ
na atsɛntsenenee nnyi hɔ bio: na omumuyɛfo twa ɔtseneneenyi ho hyia; dɛm ntsi sɛ atsɛmbu ba a

column4: na hom ho mbow hom bow paara: na mibedzi dwuma bi wɔ hom nda mu a
column5: sɛ wɔka kyerɛ hom mpo a
ɔman ayamuɔwemfo horopohoropofo a wɔnantsew asaase no ne tɛtɛr mu dɛ wɔrekɛfa tsenambea a ɔnnyɛ hɔndze edzi do."

column2: "Hɔn ho yɛ ahomtsew dɛ; na hɔn ho yɛ hu so yie: ahomemadofo a wɔyɛ dza hɔnara wɔpɛ a."
"Hɔn mpɔnkɔ so ho yɛ har sen nsebɔ
column3: na wɔyɛ abɔyafo sen anadwe mpataku; na hɔn mpɔnkɔdofo twetwe hɔn mu kɔ kan: nyew
column4: hɔn mpɔnkɔdofo fi ekyirekyir; na wotu dɛ ɔkɔr a ɔrepɛ ntsɛm akɛmemen adze."

column2: "Hɔn nyinara reba ebedzi emim; hɔn enyi do hyehyeehyew dɛ boka mframa; na wɔsesaw ndɔmmumfo dɛ anhwea."

column4: na asafohemfo ho yɛ hɔn serew: wɔserew akoban biara; na wɔhɔr dɛtse pempe
na oekedzi so: mekyerɛ hɔn a hɔn bosom nye hɔn ahoɔdzen no."

column5: ana nnyɛ ɔwo na ifi tsetsentserdee no? Ao EWURADZE
column6: nnkɛma yeewuwu osiandɛ atsɛmbu ara na ahyɛ Kaldeafo dɛ wombu hɛn; na ao ɔbotan
column7: hɛn ntsea ara ntsi na edze etsim hɔ."

column2: "Ɔwo a w’enyiwa yɛ krɔnkrɔn a inntum nnhwɛ ndzebɔn ne nyɛe
column4: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ehwɛ hɔn a wotwa nkontompɔ
column5: na nnka hwee ber a omumuyɛnyi remen nyimpa a ɔtsen sen no no?"

column2: "Na afei ayɛ nyimpa dɛ po mu nam
column3: dɛ aweaweambowa a obi nndzi hɔn do panyin."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wɔdze nkwaba twe hɔn nyina
column3: na wɔdze no eboa fa hɔn
column4: na wɔboaboa hɔn twuwii mu; na wodzi ehurusi na hɔn enyi gye."

column2: "Ne dɛm ntsi omumuyɛnyi no bɔ okum afɔr ma no boa
column3: na ɔhyew huam ma no twuwii; osiandɛ hɔn na wɔma ne kyɛfa tɔ angoa

column2: "Aso dɛm ntsi ɔnto no boa pan
column3: na ɔnkɔ do ara nkuku amanaman daa a onnya ayamuhyehye biara?"
